title: Into The Fray
description:
It used to be their world, up there. Nobody to challenge their claim. 

Yet here we are. More outposts. More intel. More firepower. If I didn't know better, I'd say we've got quite a bit of fight left in us.

trader.name: Shani
trader.description: Shani fights an uphill battle to keep Speranza safe. She could use a hand, but don't look at her sideways.

steps.title: Search for the new plant near the Baron Husk in the Old Battleground
Deliver the Possibly Toxic Plant to Lance

title: A New Type Of Plant
description: Some scouts have been bringing back reports of these weird plants spreading into the area. Now, this makes your old pal Lance think it may have some interesting uses.

trader.name: Lance
trader.description: Need health items? The only thing Lance can't cure is the common cold.

steps.title: Reach the Checkpoint
Search the Guard huts for a Armored Patrol Key Card

title: Armored Transports
description:
Ever since we expanded the tunnels to the Blue Gate, some rare pieces have started appearing on the black market. 

Meanwhile, I'm stuck here peddling battered old Rattlers. If I don't find new supply lines, I'll be left in the dust.

trader.name: Tian Wen
trader.description: Some call Tian Wen the "gun nut", but that's just half the truth. She also has a supernatural knack for tech and construction.

steps.title: Deploy into Stella Montis
Find and search 3 Androids

title: In My Image
description: I just treated one of the first Raiders who visited Stella Montis, and she said that she saw... others. Androids, very much like me.

trader.name: Lance
trader.description: Need health items? The only thing Lance can't cure is the common cold.

steps.title: Search any J Kozma Ventures container
Deliver the Rare Books to Shani

title: Cold Storage
description: Reports about Stella Montis keep coming in, and it's unlikely anything we've seen before. There may be records of relics from the past in there, and if so, I want them.

trader.name: Shani
trader.description: Shani fights an uphill battle to keep Speranza safe. She could use a hand, but don't look at her sideways.

steps.title: Take a Photo of any of the Rovers in the Sandbox
Search the papers in the Security Checkpoint room by the Lobby
Deliver a Magnetron to Tian Wen
Deliver a Flow Controller to Tian Wen

title: Snap And Salvage
description: All of Speranza is buzzing about Stella Montis right now, and I admit it's caught my attention. Let the others sort out the whats and hows; I'm interested in the tech inside.
